trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Layton
There were no other sightings in Layton on or around October 13th 2011
Summary: it was as something turned a switch and this extremely bright light turned on then off
divs: sighting detailsi was out on my deck smoking, i was looking to the north east when it apeared that something turned a switch and on comes a powerefull light, it stayed on for aprox 5 seconds.. i really felt i was looking at a man made light or extraterestial due to the brightness.... i heard no sound and watched for 30 more minuets hopein to see it again sure made me feel like i just saw something i was not suppouse to see.. i live 1\2 mile from hill airforce base? but the object was more to the east and at least 50,000 feet high....i am still excited about what i saw
